title: Shimmers & Shrouds
description: Girlfriend, money, sex appeal, media's attention and killer looks. The billionaire Orpheus Albert has it all. But he is totally obsessed with a young foreigner Oceana Viera. They fall in love and for a moment, the life looks PERFECT. But that's where they are mistaken.Confronted by the realities of his prestigious life, he is expected to rise above the level of a normal human being and make an important decision. He realizes that being a billionaire has it's price to pay. The price he's expected to pay?All he has to do is give up the person who means the world to him.Will Orpheus, who values the family's prestige over everything, fight for his love?Or will both of them continue to live afar, forever tormented?The disastrous consequences are yet to surface.
author: Scarlett Brukett
